message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure I'll be able to match this price again.
I'm very interested in the product, but $850000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. I think it's a great deal for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850000 is a bit above your budget. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering $790000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value and uniqueness. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower than this.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. I think that's a good balance between a fair price and a good deal for both of us.

I understand that you're trying to find a balance between a fair price and a good deal. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm counteroffering $785000 for the product. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great value considering the product's unique features. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
